nodes.text: Tory's Catcher was an Imperial Immobilizer 418 cruiser.
Under the command of Captain Gresia Vleen, the Imperial Immobilizer 418 cruiser Tory's Catcher patrolled the Noonian sector.

At some point before 1 ABY, the Tory's Catcher captured smugglers Thi Sawrtin and Zayl Braith, who were performing a "rutinary" smuggling run through Noonian sector. Sawrtin tried to bribe Vleen, which led Vleen to shoot Sawrtin. Then, Vleen impounded Sawrtin's ship and convinced Braith to serve a sentence on Rol II.
